name: Levelling Up Interactive Fiction & Tabletop Role-playing Games
name_original: Levelling Up Interactive Fiction & Tabletop Role-playing Games
description:
A short game about the effect of digitisation and convergence on interactive fiction and tabletop role-playing games.

Created as part of a university assignment using Twine 2 and made available under the CC BY 4.0 License (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).

Follow me on Twitter! @supertinygame
